post.body: Don't feel bad. It would have been terrific to hear from them but I totally understand. The SloTramFam called and sang. Too funny.
Just share his number and we'll all call him. He may not wake up, but he'll get the message!
If I'm not on it, it's clearly biased.
How you doing that without power?
Hey, I have an idea you I'd like to float your way. Send me mail.
How'd you know?
Actually might be heading down that way on my way to Vegas for New Years.
Thank ya kindly. Twas a lovely bday at that.
No but he DOES look like Olympic Park.
Stop that!
So sorry I didn't make it in. Dang snow/ice...well that and 350hp with no traction.
yes but I chose the road less traveled.
so are you off the highway?
How big of an area is out?
maybe not your best work.
follow @wsdot to get an idea of things. Good for all WA state folks to follow.
Snow's deep and it keeps coming. Temp is climbing though, pipes should be safe. State's pretty shut down.
...and end up being the one that gets yelled at. Mom always catches the second punch.
you forgot...AS USUALLY
Traffic Collision - No Details Location: NB I5 JSO MAGIC MOUNTAIN PKWY
Uh huh...
No, no, no...this can't be true.
Ahh man! You work BOTH days? That's rotten.
I'll tell you what's going on...we're planning on heading to Vegas for New Years. We're doomed!
Major snow coming down in Everett.
and @ainsleyofattack Drive safe. The PNW just got a whole lot less cool.
Removing my contacts always reminds me of the _chicken chasing_ scene in Rocky. G'night Twitter.
New reality cooking show idea. Create a 3 course meal from the ingredients left in the office refrigerator.
On this, my 42nd birthday, I realize with age comes wisdom. For instance, when my wife says she's crampy, I go sit in a corner for a week.
When my wife is finished preparing a meal, it's apparent the kitchen didn't give the food up willingly.
Car could use a paint job. Maybe I'll head out on the roads with the hope of getting hit by a moron in a 4x4.
Hey, WA state folks. How's the east side? Trying to decide if I should attempt the 6 am commute in a Mustang with no snowtires.
I was gonna call you, but I was at Wal-Mart and suddenly couldn't figure out how to use the phone.
If there's a cornbread shortage it's not entirely my fault. I can only prepare at restaurant volumes.
I get it God...watch what you wish for...white Christmas...yadda yadd.
Holy crap WA, the weather service is calling this storm _life threatening_. Be careful.
The cat suicide lines are heating up http://www.kittywigs.com/
Those of you that think you can drive in this snow are a source of delirious comedy for those of us that can as we drive by.
Seeing my wife with her thumb to her nose I ask: Was that "ooops!" because you snotted something out or because you inhaled your thumb?
1" of snow...that's it so far. Leave it to male weather-people to say that's equivalent to 6-8 inches.
